content: the katy cardigan a littlecarpcrochet pattern the katy cardigan overview this pattern is worked from side to side by creating two identical l shaped panels you will then flip the right panel over to mirror the left and stitch the spine of your cardigan together creating a u shape after that you will fold the panel in half bringing that top to the bottom and seaming from the armpit to the hip the sleeves will then be worked right onto the body and the hood will be done similar an extension of the front edging some ribbing pockets and you re done gauge 10 stitches x 11 row of moss stitch single_crochet into ch1 space ch1 sk1 4 x 4 square sizing size cardigan circumference xs 31 fits 28 -30 s 35 fits 32 -34 m 39 fits 36 -38 l 43 fits 40 -42 xl 47 fits 44 -46 2x 51 fits 48 -50 3x 55 fits 52 -54 the katy cardigan is designed with 1 -3 of positive ease across the largest part of your chest so if you would like a looser or tighter fit please move up or down a size materials & abbreviations materials needed 10 mm hook or hook to meet gauge scissors needle tape measure or gauge square bulky 5 weight 7wpi yarn yardage xs 800 s 900 m 975 l 1125 xl 1225 2x 1350 3x 1475 abbreviations single_crochet -
